name: Dark Light (itch) (EmperorEnema)
description:
As the sole survivor onboard an exploration craft, you must find your way out, but amidst failing power and a mysterious entity skulking the shadows, you find that light may be your only solace.

University project created as part of a group of four. An unknown evil haunts the shadows of your vessel. You must manage your power supply in order to keep the lights on, as you try to escape the ship. Darkness… means death.
